reviewtext: I can confirm that this model here does NOT have the volume control in-line, thankfully.Edit:After owning these for several months, I put a pair through the wash.  They still worked but the foam died.  I bought another pair, and have concluded these are overall the best buds for the price.Edit #2:After ordering a second pair and using them for a bit, they too have given way and the expansive response of the foam no longer prevails amidst the sweat, etc.  Therefore I am off to buy my 3rd set.  For such a low price, I really could care less.
summary: Comfortable, stay put, BEST value for price
